mapper.select: SELECT CTG_CODE, CTG_CODE_PRT, CTG_NAME FROM CATEGORY_TBL WHERE CTG_CODE_PRT IS NULL
SELECT CTG_CODE, CTG_CODE_PRT, CTG_NAME FROM CATEGORY_TBL WHERE CTG_CODE_PRT = #{ctg_code}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_TBL WHERE CTG_CODE = #{ctg_code} AND
PDT_NUMBER > 0

SELECT PDT_NUMBER, CTG_CODE, CTG_CODE_PRT, PDT_NAME, PDT_PRICE, PDT_DISCOUNT, PDT_COMPANY, PDT_IMG_FOLDER, PDT_IMG, PDT_DETAIL, PDT_BUY_AMOUNT, PDT_SELL_AMOUNT, PDT_BUY_ACCEPT, PDT_SIGN_DATE, PDT_UPDATE_DATE, RVW_CNT FROM PRODUCT_TBL WHERE PDT_NUMBER = #{pdt_number}

SELECT P.PDT_NUMBER, P.CTG_CODE, P.CTG_CODE_PRT, P.PDT_NAME, P.PDT_PRICE, P.PDT_DISCOUNT, P.PDT_COMPANY, P.PDT_IMG_FOLDER, P.PDT_IMG, P.PDT_DETAIL, P.PDT_BUY_AMOUNT, P.PDT_BUY_ACCEPT, P.PDT_SIGN_DATE, P.PDT_UPDATE_DATE, P.RVW_CNT FROM PRODUCT_TBL P INNER JOIN CATEGORY_TBL C ON P.CTG_CODE = C.CTG_CODE WHERE C.CTG_CODE IN (SELECT CTG_CODE FROM CATEGORY_TBL WHERE CTG_CODE = #{ctg_code}) AND ROWNUM < 9
